title: Reincarnated As A Villainess’ Stepmother, And I Promise I Will Make My Daughter Happy. Whether They Be A Prince, A Knight, Or A Chancellor? I Won’t Hand Over My Daughter To Any Of Them - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Caring Protagonist   Childcare   Cute Children   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Marriage   Otome Game   Reincarnated in a Game World   Villainess Noble Girls
author: 牧野　麻也
description:
Selene, the daughter of a poor aristocrat, realized the moment she married the Marquis that this was the world of an Otome Game, and that the young girl, the daughter of the Marquis, was the villainess of the Otome game, Athy.

In her previous life, Selene wanted to have a child but was unable to do so. In this life, she will love Athy as much as she can, raise her to be a perfect beautiful girl, and enjoy the best life of parenting.

Will such a wish be fulfilled?>
